Title: Network Outage
Description: The company's network is currently down, affecting all departments.

Title: Server Failure
Description: One of the critical servers has experienced a failure, impacting several services.

Title: Software Bug
Description: A bug in the latest software release is causing unexpected behavior in the application.

Title: Security Breach
Description: Unauthorized access to the system detected. Security protocols activated.

Title: Hardware Malfunction
Description: Issue with hardware components causing disruptions in various systems.
